channel.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
channel.description:
# Rules:
Every post here must contain a class. It could be an existing one or something new. If the class is an existing FoL class, the name is simply enough to qualify it. If it is a class that is already in this thread, put down the name hyperlinked to the post in this thread that includes its class card. Otherwise you must make the entire class card.
Classes must adhere to [this format](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/class-suggestion-template/47799). (Although for **Blue Dragon** classes, the objective can instead read “ *Your objective is to defeat the scum faction and any neutrals that seek to do you harm* ”). A class must have at the very least a name, faction, type and win condition (include the win condition even when it’s obvious, such as if they are Blue Dragon).
Include the post number of your post in its description. A post number may only cover one class + any of its conversions.
**Classes can NOT prevent others from appearing in a game by being rolled.** **You can not change any aspect of an existing post in a future post.** **Consecutive duplicate posts of the same class are banned unless that class is Vanilla Town. This includes named variants.** **You may not change the base mechanics of the game using your classes and then say 'reroll this slot.'** **Effort is required for your class, if it is just a named citizen it may be removed by the host.** **You must use one of the 6 class types from vanilla FoL in your classes.** **Moderators will delete classes that do not fit the rules of this thread.**
# Special FoL Specific Rules:
If a converted class is not given, Neutrals and scum faction classes should automatically be considered immune, and Blue Dragon should be considered convertable, with their unseen version having the same abilities that their Blue Dragon form does.
Converted classes can spawn at the start of a game.
There is no limit to the number of factions that can appear.
The King can be any faction of those that appear in the game, even new ones. If a Buttered Popcorn faction member is rolled, you can have a Buttered Popcorn King. The chance for each individual King to appear is always the same as any other King.
# Host Notes:
The host has the right to reject/reroll any class if they so wish.
GIFoL games fall under SFoL.
To start this thread: 1 **[color=steblue]The Prince[/color]**

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
2044

The Realistic Multi-level Marketer

Cult Special

Charisma (Passive) - You have access to the following effects:

If any member of the Cult becomes king, they will retain their original class’s abilities alongside their new ones.
If you target the Neutral Evil with your night abilities, they will be added to the scum chat.
The factional kill may not be performed alongside conversion unless there is only one member of the cult alive.
If the Cult Leader dies, their role transfers to the next oldest member of the cult.
You are immune to roleblocking on Night 1.

Essential Oils (Day) - Cause a player to start bleeding. They will die in two nights if not healed. - 1 Use

Brainwash (Night) - Change a player into their respective Cult class. If you are the only member of the Cult alive on Night 1, you may target two players. If the first conversion attempt would fail for any reason, you will attempt to convert the second without visiting the first. - Infinite Uses, 1 night cooldown if successful

Ancient Proverbs (Night) - Retrain a member of the Cult into a different Cult class (other than Cult Leader). Neither you or they will be able to perform other actions tonight. If this is used on a player who is not a member of the Cult, you will learn if they would be able to be converted this night. - Infinite Uses

Defeat the Blue Dragon.

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: Nightingale
item.description:
Aelin:

uninformed minority

2041

uninformed minority

Town Special

owo whats this (passive) - 3/4 of the players will be mafia and 1/4 of the players will be town at rand. Executions fail if only mafia vote. Each night, the mafia are forced to choose one of their own to die, in place of a factional kill.

town wincon

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: Aelin
item.description:
2040

Dementor

Neutral Killing

Poor Setup Design (Passive) - Any nightkills made against you will be redirected to a random member of the uninformed majority. This does not include kills that occur as a result of visiting another player, such as a Bodyguard or a Paranoid Gun Owner.

Magic (Day) - Magic happens, and you now become immune to roleblocks and redirections, and bypass bodyguards and death immunity. And your Dementor’s Kiss will kill a member of the informed minority without announcing that you exist. Because… magic! (2 Uses)

Dementor’s Kiss (Night) - Choose a player. If they are a member of the town, you will kill them. If they are a member of any informed minority, instead, your presence in the game will be modannounced at the beginning of the next day. (Infinite Uses)

Win Condition - Reach F3 while alive.

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: EliThePsycho
item.description:
2039

Zombuul/DA/MM but it’s an all-in-one deal!

Mafia Killer

Mastermind (Passive) - If you die to execution, the game will last for one more day. If anybody is executed that day, their team loses and all others win. If nobody is executed, then your team loses and all others win.
Zombuul (Passive) - The first time you would truly die, you live but appear dead. Additionally, everybody may vote for anyone, even dead players.

Devil’s Advocate (Day) - Choose a player (you cannot choose the same player twice in a row). They will not die if they are executed tommorow. - Infinite uses

Demon (Night) - If nobody died the previous day, pick a player. They die. - Infinite uses

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: Nightingale
item.description:
2038

bmr but its hell instead

Mafia Killing

theyre all either over entirely by day 3 (Night) - Choose one of the following abilities to use. You must cycle through all of them before reusing any.

  • bad moon rising - Roleblock a player. They will die when you next use this ability.
  • poor moon ascending - Kill a player. If you chose to kill nobody the previous night, you may kill 3 players instead.
  • evil moon going upwards - If nobody died by execution today, kill a player. If you die before you use this ability again, you will not actually die, but you will appear to.
  • moon of questionable quality moving in the direction that is away from the horizon - Kill 2 players. One of them might be revived the next time you use this ability.

or there are still 10 players alive on day 7 (Night) - Choose two of the following abilities to use. You must cycle through all of them before reusing any.

  • good sun falling - Target a player. If they are eliminated the following day, they will not die.
  • barren crescent elevating - If a negative- or no-utility town role died in the night, you may kill a player.
  • morally dubious sphere of rock orbiting - Once per game, you may strongman-kill a player when you choose this ability.
  • majoras mask but reverse - If the last Mafia dies before the start of the next night, the game will last another day. If a player is executed on that day, their team loses.

Mafia Wincon

Read full topic

[/joke]

Town Killing

[/CANCELLED] (Day) - Publically say in thread:

to kill all players who you you have previously targeted with [/QUOTE].

Realistic Serial Killer

Neutral Killing

turns out getting away with murder is a lot harder than it looks (Night): Each night, you may attack a player. You will be jailkept and modpeeked if you attack a player successfully
Defeat the uninformed majority and the informed minority

Mafia “Realistic” Unfunny Joke

Mafia Killing

Took you guys about 5 seconds to beat this joke to death huh (Night): Each night, target a player. If they are a class with the word “Realistic” in the name then they will be strongman killed.
Mafia wincon

item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: Nightingale
item.description:
2032

text size/color/formatting swapper

town special

nobody liked visually appealing rolecards anyways (passive): Large text on all players’ rolecard, is replaced with small text and vice versa. Colored text on all players’ rolecards is replaced with uncolored text and vice versa. Bold text on all players’ rolecards is replaced with italics and vice versa.

Chaos and Bloodshed (Passive): Because of this, the Mafia will not learn who each other are as long as you are alive. The host decides who the mafia factional kill targets each night.

You win when all threats to the Town are eliminated.

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
2030

Realistic Neighbor

Town Social

i dont know what if you don’t like your neighbors (Passive): You live near people. This, mechanically, means nothing, but you can rest assured that you don’t live in the middle of nowhere. Or if you do, you’re not alone.

town wincon

2031

Realistic Friendly Neighbor

Town Social

i guess you like your neighbors or are just a weirdo who is exteroverted (Night): Target a player. You will give them a pie, which does nothing but it does taste good. Unless you’re a bad chef. Regardless of your culinary skills, the target player will be told that you (the player) gave them a pie, and are a Friendly Neighbor. You may only target a player N places away from you on the playerlist, where N is the night number. - One use

town wincon

(So on night 1, you may only target directly above/below, on night 2 you may target up to 2 places above/below, etc)

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: GGhana
item.description:
2029

Realistic Voyeur

Town Investigative

Who the fuck gave this role this name (Nigh): Each night, target a player. You learn what type of actions targeted them last night. If you claim your role or your ability results you will be immediately blocked from posting and may only vote for the rest of the game, this is because you have been discovered to be on the Sex Offenders Registry for public urination.
Town wincon

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
2028

Realistic Watcher

Town Investigative

So you just… watch people? At night? Without them knowing? And you’re the good guy? (Night) - Target someone to learn everyone who visited them that night. If someone ever looks into your past (A.K.A. you are ever targetted by an investigative) you will be automatically jailkept for 3 nights because that’s, like, extremely creepy.

Town wincon

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: Nightingale
item.description:
2027

Marionette

Mafia Special

Neighbours Confusing (Passive) - You beleive you are a Town role, but your abilities do not work and any information you receive is arbitrary. The in-group Mafia know who you are.
Bweakfast (Passive) - Each Night, including Night 0, the in-group Mafia must choose a player. They will know that they were chosen. If that player dies, then all Mafia die as well. You are positioned in the playerlist neighbouring the Mafia’s Night 0 pick.

Mafia Wincondition

Read full topic
item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: GGhana
item.description:
Realistic Consort

Neutral Social
Diplomatic Marriage(Passive): You are in all of the King’s neighbourhood chats and may talk in them at all times. You share a private chat with the king.
Gossipy Hens (Night): Target a player, add them to a private neighbourhood and use a Voyuer action on them
The Woman Behind the Man (Night): Passively strongman the kings action tonight
Your win condition is randomly assigned at the start of the game, you have a 1/5 chance of your alignment being changed to the Informed Minority win condition, and a 4/5 chance of it being changed to the Uninformed Majority win condition.

2026

Read full topic

2024

this joke isn’t funny anymore (night) Each night you may pick a player, you learn if they are an unfunny role with a name that signifies to a year in the second millennium of the Earth calendar

item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
2023

2023

Neutral Special

Earth: Become Human (Passive): You do not remember who you are. Upon the death of the first human player, you will inherit their win condition and a one shot usage of all of their abilities, if they had two or more uses of it left. If the ability is infinite use, you will instead gain two uses of it.

You cannot win until you Become Human.

Read full topic

item.description:

2022

Mafia Offensive

gotta say i didn’t expect the murder wasps to come back as the psychic amnesia wasps from another dimension (Passive) - All investigative results will be replaced with [REDACTED].

Mafia wincon

item.source: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2

item.title: SFoL Grand Idea Class Thread V2
item.dc:creator: katze
item.description:
2021

2021

Town Support

nya? (Passive) - If you claim or hint at being this role, you will be publicly assassinated. By the hosts.
hiss (Passive) - If you target the same player three times with you are now a cat, nya, you will instead kill them, bypassing normal death immunity and protection.
you are now a cat, nya (Night) - Target a player. They will be protected from death that night, and must use “nya” (or other cat-like noises) in at least 25% of their posts tomorrow. They will be informed of this. You may not target the same player consecutively. - Infinite uses

town wincon

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
2020

2020

Town special

pandemifuck you (Passive) - All town members who try to visit somebody will be roleblocked. This effect will be disabled once all town members with visiting abilities do not visit anybody in the same night phase (and you will be notified). Good luck organizing that or getting people to believe you.

Town wincon
